titles.title: Twenty Seven Sunday in ordinary time Year C

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O that today you
would listen to his voice!
Harden not your hearts.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, let us ring out
our joy to the Lord,
hail the rock who saves us.
Let us come into his presence,
giving thanks,
let us hail him
with a son of praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O come;
let us bow and bend low.
Let us kneel before the God
who made us,
for he is our God and we
the people who belong
to his pasture,
the flock that is led
by his hand.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O that today you would
listen to his voice.
"Harden not not your hearts
as at Meribah, as on that
day at Massah in the desert
when your forebears
put me to the test;
when they tried me,
though they saw my work".
